articles.author: Katie Hunt
articles.title: A supervolcano eruption may have facilitated humanity’s migration out of Africa, a new study suggests - CNN
articles.description: An archaeological site in Ethiopia has revealed that a population of humans survived the eruption of Sumatra’s Mount Toba 74,000 years ago.
articles.content:
